claim: No consensus has been reached on who designed the first American flag.

supporting.text: Historical records from the 18th century are incomplete and often contradictory, leaving no definitive evidence of the flag's designer.

attacks.text: Historical records from the 18th century are incomplete and often contradictory, leaving no definitive evidence of the flag's designer.
